Package uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.signatureFile

Class Summary
ByteSeqSpecifier Defines the permissible values to be taken by a specific sequence of bytes.
ByteSequence holds details of a byte sequence
FFSignatureFile holds details of a signature file and uses it to identify binary files
FileFormat holds details of a file format
FileFormatCollection holds a collection of file formats used by the XML parsing code
InternalSignature holds the details of an internal signature
InternalSignatureCollection holds a collection of internal signatures used by the XML parsing code
LeftFragment holds the details of a left fragment associated with a subsequence
RightFragment holds the details of a right fragment associated with a subsequence
Shift holds a shift function value
SideFragment holds the details of a left or right fragment associated with a subsequence
SubSequence holds a subsequence for a byte sequence also contains most of the logic for identifying files
